steps.criteria: [NPC] Librarian: Greetings! Welcome to the Library!
[NPC] Blacksmith: I'm the town Blacksmith! I can reforge items for you, for a price.

steps.criteria: [NPC] Lone Adventurer: Try killing 5 of them!
[NPC] Grandma Wolf: The pet does not need to be spawned for combos to work! Happy hunting!
